author: redaccion@elterritorio.com.ar (El Territorio)
title: San José: el accidente más fatal del 2025 y uno de los peores en años en Misiones
text:
San José: el accidente más fatal del 2025 y uno de los peores en años en Misiones
El vuelco de un colectivo que transportaba trabajadores forestales, ocurrido este jueves sobre el kilómetro 801 de la Ruta Nacional 14, en jurisdicción de San José, dejó un saldo de siete personas fallecidas y al menos diez heridos de gravedad, y fue calificado como el accidente vial más grave del 2025 en Misiones.
El siniestro, provocado presuntamente por el reventón de una cubierta, se convirtió en el más letal en lo que va del año y uno de los más trágicos registrados en los últimos tiempos en la provincia. El impacto provocó que la unidad de doble piso se despistara y volcara sobre su lateral derecho.
Este nuevo hecho marca un punto crítico dentro de un escenario ya alarmante. Sólo en enero de este año, los siniestros viales en Misiones dejaron un saldo de 16 personas fallecidas, superando incluso el total de muertes registradas en accidentes durante todo el 2024. Del total de víctimas, 14 eran hombres, una mujer y un niño, siendo Garupá la localidad más afectada.
Hasta ahora, el hecho más trágico del 2025 había sido el ocurrido el 3 de marzo en Garuhapé, donde cuatro personas -entre ellas una niña de 9 año- murieron tras un choque múltiple y posterior impacto contra un árbol.
No obstante, uno de los peores siniestros viales en la historia reciente de la provincia ocurrió el 11 de febrero de 2018, también en cercanías a San José, sobre la Ruta 105. Aquel día, un choque frontal entre un Peugeot 307 y una Renault Duster provocó un incendio que dejó diez víctimas fatales, entre ellas seis adultos y cuatro menores. El trágico episodio tuvo lugar a pocos kilómetros del peaje de Fachinal y conmocionó a toda la provincia.
El siniestro de San José de hoy ocurrió cuando un colectivo de doble piso, que transportaba a trabajadores forestales de una empresa correntina, habría sufrido un desperfecto mecánico, despistó y volcó. La Red de Traslado de Misiones activó un amplio operativo sanitario, derivando heridos a centros de salud en San José, Apóstoles, Cerro Azul y Posadas, incluido el Hospital Escuela Ramón Madariaga.
La tragedia renovó la preocupación en torno a la seguridad vial en la provincia y dejó en evidencia la necesidad urgente de reforzar los controles y condiciones del transporte de pasajeros.

author: Admin
title: Revolutionizing Hydration On-The-Go: OnTheGo Drinkware Launches Premium Line of Sustainable Portable Devices
text:
United Kingdom – OnTheGo Drinkware is proud to unveil its latest line of innovative hydration solutions, designed to revolutionize the way we stay hydrated while promoting sustainability. With a focus on compact, foldable, and convenient designs, OnTheGo Drinkware’s portable devices are not just water bottles; they are a lifestyle accessory catering to the health-conscious and environmentally aware consumer.
Introducing OnTheGo Drinkware: Your Go-To Source for Portable Hydration
In a world where staying hydrated is key to overall well-being, OnTheGo Drinkware emerges as a trailblazer, providing a range of premium, sustainable hydration devices. The brand’s commitment to health and the environment is encapsulated in its thoughtfully designed products that go beyond mere functionality.
Sustainable Hydration: A Win-Win for Health and the Environment
At the heart of OnTheGo Drinkware’s ethos is the belief that hydration should not come at the expense of the planet. The company emphasizes the importance of choosing reusable drinkware, promoting a real win-win scenario where personal health is prioritized alongside positive environmental impact.
The focus on sustainability is evident in OnTheGo Drinkware’s star products, the Silicone Foldable Water Bottle and the Foldable Water Bottle. These meticulously crafted devices offer a unique blend of convenience and eco-friendliness. The foldable design ensures easy storage, making them the perfect companions for commuters, hikers, campers, fishing enthusiasts, and travelers.
What Sets OnTheGo Drinkware Apart?
Compact and Foldable Design: The standout feature of OnTheGo Drinkware’s products is their compact and foldable design. Unlike traditional water bottles, these devices can be easily folded and stowed away in pockets or handbags after use, eliminating storage concerns.
Convenience for Every Lifestyle: Whether you’re on a daily commute, hiking through the great outdoors, camping under the stars, or exploring new destinations, OnTheGo Drinkware ensures that hydration is never compromised. These devices seamlessly integrate into various lifestyles, providing unparalleled convenience.
Sustainability at Its Core: OnTheGo Drinkware is committed to reducing single-use plastic waste. By choosing these reusable and durable devices, consumers actively contribute to a more sustainable and eco-friendly future.
Explore the OnTheGo Difference
Visit OnTheGo Drinkware’s
website to explore the full range of products and discover why the Silicone Foldable Water Bottle and the Foldable Water Bottle are making waves in the world of portable hydration.
OnTheGo Drinkware is not just a brand; it’s a lifestyle choice for those who prioritize health, convenience, and sustainability. Join them in the movement towards a hydrated and eco-conscious future.
About OnTheGo Drinkware:
OnTheGo Drinkware is a brand committed to providing innovative and sustainable hydration solutions. With a range of premium products designed for convenience and eco-friendliness, OnTheGo Drinkware aims to revolutionize the way individuals stay hydrated on-the-go.

author: Haadiza Ogwude, Cincinnati Enquirer
title: Cincinnati weather: Slightly warmer temps, widespread rain forecast for the weekend
text:
Cincinnati weather: Slightly warmer temps, widespread rain forecast for the weekend Haadiza Ogwude, Cincinnati Enquirer Fri, December 13, 2024 at 11:43 AM UTC 2 min read
After a cold start to the day, slightly warmer air will build into the region Friday through Saturday.
According to the National Weather Service in Wilmington , widespread cloud cover will keep temperatures relatively stable in the upper teens to mid-20s on Friday morning. Thicker mid-level to high clouds will spread over the region through daybreak.
The rest of the day will remain mostly cloudy, with highs around 30 degrees in the north to around 40 degrees in the south.
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement Tranquil weather conditions are forecast for early Saturday, with seasonably cold conditions continuing. Highs will climb into the lower 40s in the north to the lower 50s in the south.
Widespread rain is expected from Saturday evening into Sunday. Widespread rain will taper off by Sunday afternoon, though breezy conditions will linger.
Widespread precipitation will return to the region Monday afternoon through evening. Winds will be around 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph.
The area is forecast to accumulate between one to two inches of rainfall with localized higher amounts Saturday night through Monday night. Another chance for precipitation will occur mid-week. The National Weather Service will monitor flooding threats during this unsettled period.
Friday remains dry before our next weather system arrives Saturday evening into the overnight hours with widespread rainfall. pic.twitter.com/nNgh43y1SG
— NWS Wilmington OH (@NWSILN) December 13, 2024
Detailed 7-day Cincinnati weather forecast Friday : Partly sunny, with a high near 38. East wind around 7 mph.
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement Friday night : Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low of around 26. East wind around 6 mph.
Saturday : Mostly cloudy, with a high near 49. East wind around 8 mph.
Saturday night: Rain. Low around 40. Southeast wind 8 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. The chance of precipitation is 100%. New precipitation amounts between a half and three-quarters of an inch possible.
Sunday : Rain. High near 51. Southeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. The chance of precipitation is 100%. New precipitation amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
Sunday night: Rain likely, mainly before 1 a.m. Cloudy, with a low of around 47. The chance of precipitation is 70%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement More in U.S. Humpback whale’s spectacular breach is sadly revealing; photos FTW Outdoors She took a DNA test for fun. Police used it to charge her grandmother with murder in a cold case CNN Joe Burrow Said His “Privacy Has Been Violated In More Ways Than One” After Model Olivia Ponton Was Named As The 22-Year-Old “Employee” Who Reported The Robbery At His Home BuzzFeed UCLA student sues California doctors, says she was 'fast-tracked' into transgender surgery NBC News Monday : Rain. High near 58. The chance of precipitation is 90%.
Tuesday : Mostly sunny, with a high near 49.
Wednesday: There will be a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 45. The chance of precipitation is 30%.
Thursday: There is a chance of rain. Partly sunny, with a high near 39. The chance of precipitation is 30%.
Source: National Weather Service, Wilmington.
This article originally appeared on Cincinnati Enquirer: Cincinnati weather: Widespread rain, slight warm-up this weekend

author: 网易
title: 港姐冠军老公想参加中年好声音，秘密练歌，认为70岁有理想是福气|曾志伟_网易订阅
text:
TVB王牌真人秀节目《 中年好声音 》在香港人气火爆，不少明星名流亦有关注。近日《中年好声音3》决赛完结，而据TVB总经理 曾志伟 先生透露，《中年好声音4》已开启报名通道，想必届时又将有不少实力唱将在舞台上发光发亮。
令人料想不到的是，身为《中年好声音3》赞助商的邬友正先生，也公开发文称要参加下一届的《中年好声音》，并且曝光了他自己在家秘密练歌的片段。
邬友正是七海化工集团有限公司主席、海马集团主席，香港知名人士。他除了是一名实业家，更因婚恋而经常成为娱乐版头条人物。邬友正的太太翁嘉穗，是1997年 港姐 冠军，两人当年于美国拉斯维加斯完婚，婚后育有两子。夫妻二人虽有20岁年龄差，但十分恩爱，经常一起出席公开活动。
早在去年，邬友正已准备参加《中年好声音》，但不断被身边人泼冷水，被指不务正业，用他自己的话说：没有人信，没有人支持，连最亲近的人都看衰我。邬友正的老助手更犀利直言，说他相信邬先生什么都能做到，但唱歌一定不行，因为声底太差，无论怎么努力都是徒劳无功。还有不少人劝他，说堂堂公司老板，为什么要出来献丑，给人批评和耻笑？
但邬友正似乎已下定决心参赛，不仅请了专业老师指导，还在自家豪宅里反复练唱，更在歌词单上用心标记。下月17日是邬先生的生日，他对外吐露打算18日报名，“给自己一份最大的生日礼物。”邬友正更表示，自己不怕评判羞辱和观众的批评。他豪爽表示“大家尽管骂，有机会在电视上给你们骂，是我的光荣”，“70岁还有理想，是我的福气。”
对于自己身份特殊，邬友正亦看得很淡。他说刘洋是火锅店老板，一样可以拿到第三名，对方可以，他应该也有机会。因钟意该节目，邬友正还表示希望下一届《中年好声音》他可以当冠名赞助商，到时还会派票回馈街坊。 “年纪大不要紧，最重要有目标”，邬友正能量满满，言谈举止振奋人心。
当然参加《中年好声音》晋级并非易事，邬友正也指他多少被参加者水准之高而震惊，难免犹豫，但不管怎样，他还是打算“向奇迹进军”。
如果邬友正先生真的参加《中年好声音》，且成功晋级，想必那会令该节目更有看点。
邬友正先生一向真性情，他去年入驻小红书平台，就因率真言论引来不少关注。不管他是否参加《中年好声音》，以及能否晋级，仅他这份对生活的热忱，以及敢于挑战自我、追求梦想的态度，就极具感染力了。相信无论结果如何，他的参与都能为《中年好声音》增添一份独特的魅力！
70岁又如何？不设限的人生，永远充满可能。期待邬友正先生“向奇迹进军”，也期待有更多的人像他一样，勇敢展现自己的光芒！
声明：虚构演绎，仅供娱乐

author: By: Julio Mora Rodriguez
title: Eugene Mission hosts open house for Christmas, looks ahead to 2024.
text:
EUGENE, Ore -- The Eugene Mission has a long history of helping out the community, and in 2023 they continued their legacy.
Christmas Eve and Christmas Day were two of the busiest days of the year for the Eugene Mission. According to organizers like Director of Life Change Denver Harris, it was an unforgettable experience.
He said, "Christmas Eve was probably the highlight of the year for me here at the Eugene Mission, we had a candlelight service for communion."
More than 90 Eugene Mission guests showed up for the open house hosted by the Mission on Christmas Eve alone. Director of Philanthropy Beth Sheehan said it was one of the largest gathering they've seen in years. Plenty of staff and volunteers were standing by to tend to the Mission's guests.
Most of the guests have battled through their own struggles and are using the mission's rehabilitation programs. There were plenty of activities at the open house, from gingerbread house contests to religious services.
Harris said, "We had family that showed up for the guests and actually engaged in the service with us. We had a candlelight lighting at the end that was incredibly moving and there was a lot of hope that was presented and taken from that service."
Christmas Day was followed by more activities for the guests. It was a day of hot meals and gifts, and most of the gifts came from a Les Schwab toy drive. There was even live music at the Learning Center at the Mission. More than 200 people came through on Christmas Day according to organizers.
Sheehan said, "We've been spending today cleaning everything up, including the soup that splashed all over the floor and starting to put Christmas away, but it was probably the most festive Christmas we've had yet."
Reflecting on 2023, the directors said it was a productive year for the community organization. They are grateful for the support from the community, which according to them is extremely high right now. For the first time since the COVID-19 pandemic, the organization feels like they're back on their feet. They credit this resurgence in 2023 with the availability of new programs at the Eugene Mission, and with providing a more interactive volunteer experience.
Sheehan said, "We've seen a huge increase of the classes that we're offering for our guests that are life skills, that are sober recreation, and hobby development as a sober person. They're taking taking classes in 12 week blocks."
Over 200 volunteers now help out at the Eugene Mission. It's a far cry from where the mission was just a few years ago.
Sheehan said, "One of the wonderful challenges that we have is that we are running out of classroom space, and so we're going to be looking at a classroom expansion project. "
The plan heading into 2024 for the Eugene Mission is expansion of programs. They are getting ready to complete a barista training project as one of the life skills classes. These vocational classes, according to the directors, are incredibly important and successful.
Harris said, "Getting people CDLs, getting people into welding school, getting people into the culinary department, it's something that we started three years ago, but now it's starting to get a lot of momentum behind it."
Sheehan also talked about the possibility of making an alumni program for volunteers. Many of them were once guests at the Eugene Mission themselves.
